titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the appointment of Barber B. Conable, Jr., as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S863)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 103-25.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 37.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Clay asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.
The House struck all after the enacting clause and inserted in lieu thereof the provisions of a similar measure H.J. Res. 102. Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended to that of similar measure H.J. Res. 102. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
A similar measure H.J. Res. 102 was laid on the table without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate and at desk: House amendments to Senate bill.
Senate agreed to the House amendments by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/23/1993--Passed House amended. Appoints Barber B. Conable, Jr., of New York to fill a vacancy on the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
